myfaces-tobago_c8732e6.message:
TOBAGO-1818 Progress in the Measure class (cleanup and CSS support)
* update javadoc for *ListEditor classes
* tc:segmentLayout margins can now separated by space
* adjust description for segment layout attributes
* fix NPE: BootstrapClass.valueOf(Measure, Attributes)
* correct segment values greater than 12 or lower than 1 and log it
* fix SegmentLayoutConstraint overwrite attributes
* add a test for BootstrapClass.valueOf(Measure, Attributes)
* improve segment layout demo page

file.patch:
@@ -33,8 +33,8 @@

This example show a segment layout with four and three columns and a segment layout with 'auto' and '*'.

The sum of the values is 12.

- 
<tc:segmentLayout extraSmall="2;3;4;3">
- + 
<tc:segmentLayout extraSmall="2seg 3seg 4seg 3seg">
+ @@ -48,8 +48,8 @@

The sum of the values is 8. After the third element, the sequence starts from the beginning. So the fourth element got a value of 2.

- 
<tc:segmentLayout extraSmall="2;2;4">
- + 
<tc:segmentLayout extraSmall="2seg 2seg 4seg">
+ @@ -59,8 +59,8 @@ - 
<tc:segmentLayout extraSmall="*;auto;*">
- + 
<tc:segmentLayout extraSmall="* auto *">
+

the remaining space

@@ -85,11 +85,11 @@ small and extraSmall.

In the following example, all attributes are used. If you are on a desktop you can see the different behavior by changing the size of the browser window.

- 
<tc:segmentLayout extraLarge="1" large="2"
-      medium="3" small="4" extraSmall="6">
+    
<tc:segmentLayout extraLarge="1seg" large="2seg"
+      medium="3seg" small="4seg" extraSmall="6seg">
     ...

 
-    
+    
       
       
       
@@ -111,10 +111,10 @@
       marginExtraLarge.

     
Possible values are none, left, right and both.

 
-    
<tc:segmentLayout extraSmall="5;3"
-      marginExtraSmall="none;both;left;both">
+    
<tc:segmentLayout extraSmall="5seg 3seg"
+      marginExtraSmall="none both left both">
     ...

-    
+    
       
       
       
@@ -132,15 +132,15 @@
     
Possible values are from 1 to 11 for offsetExtraSmall.

       For the other attributes possible values are from 0 to 11.

       A offsetMedium="0" overwrite the offset from smaller proportions.

-    
<tc:segmentLayout extraSmall="2;2;2;2;2;2">
+    
<tc:segmentLayout extraSmall="2seg 2seg 2seg 2seg 2seg 2seg">
   <tc:in value="1"/>
   <tc:in value="2">
     <tc:segmentLayoutConstraint offsetExtraSmall="1" offsetSmall="2"
       offsetMedium="3" offsetLarge="4" offsetExtraLarge="5"/>
   </tc:in>
   ...
 </tc:segmentLayout>

-    
+    
       
       
         extraLarge for the layout.

       And: marginExtraSmall, marginSmall, marginMedium, marginLarge,
       marginExtraLarge for the margins.

-    
<tc:segmentLayout extraSmall="4;8">
+    
<tc:segmentLayout extraSmall="4seg 8seg">
   <tc:in value="4"/>
   <tc:in value="8"/>
   <tc:in value="3 - both">
     <tc:segmentLayoutConstraint extraSmall="3" marginExtraSmall="both"/>
   </tc:in>
   <tc:in value="8"/>
 </tc:segmentLayout>

-    
+
